info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 1:59PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow will impact portions of west central Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 300 PM MST... At 158 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking moderate to heavy snow along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Twin Bridges to 12 miles north of Leadore. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility down to a half mile or less and slippery roads. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Sheridan, Alder, Grant, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Bannack, Laurin, Clark Canyon, Bannack State Park, and Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected.
